description.description: The Soaring Hawk Drone Company is an aerial video and photography business, based out of Richmond, Virginia.  We specialize in beautiful custom videos and photographs for any commercial or residential property as well as construction sites and other land surveys.  Look through some past projects and reach out with your project idea.

text.text: The Soaring Hawk Drone Company is an aerial video and photography business, based out of Richmond, Virginia. sections.title: Get In Touch
sections.subTitle: Have a project idea? Provide us with a little information.
